about_the_game:
A visual novel about a man who discovers the existence of another dimension hidden in dreams.

Explore and learn the rules of a new reality, meet fellow dreamwalkers and solve the mystery of a disaster in the past, while simultaneously avoiding getting fired from your day job as a software designer. Make decisions, build relationships and strive to reach the best ending!

Features


  • An atmospheric and gripping storyline
  • Player choices affect how the story develops
  • Branching paths
  • Built-in relationship system tracks what people think of you
  • Beautiful character art
  • A single playthrough time of a few hours

Meet the Dreamwalkers




⭐ A self-employed artist, Sonya is a young woman who will soon become an integral part of your adventures into the world between, a hidden dimension located between dreams and reality. She is creative and confident, but quickly you'll learn that she seems to be harbouring a secret of some kind. What is it she's not telling you? Will you remain acquaintances, become friends or perhaps even something more? The choices are yours to make.



⭐ A knowledgeable and intelligent man, Henry and Sonya have known each other since childhood. Also a Dreamwalker, Henry has a tragic past, of which he doesn't much enjoy talking about. These past events have molded him into someone very serious and formal, and he rarely ever smiles - but a researcher and a coordinator, Henry is nevertheless someone you'll certainly want as an ally.



⭐ Energetic, friendly and outgoing - anywhere else Yukiko might seem like a normal teenager, but in the world between it's immediately apparent that she's anything but. For some reason, the world doesn't seem to react to her the same way it does to anyone else. What is the mystery behind this young girl?

Make the story yours


These are just a few of the people you'll meet in Dreamwalker. Experience the story yourself, coming in 2023.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game does not contain nudity or sexual content.

The game does contain profanity, scenes with alcohol-use and abuse of medication.

Depending on your choices, your playthrough might also contain descriptions of violence, self-harm, torment and other possibly disturbing content. These scenes are quite rare though, and they are almost entirely text and descriptions without visuals.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card

name: Dreamwalker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
